author: jason
title: Rewarding Payroll Solutions Resume
description: Resumes are biased. A more trustless system helps hiring & leads to targeted discounts. Advertising in 2021 $649b & a bad hire costs ~$240k.
solution: Qualify workers based on ledger documented wages. Evidence leads to a higher starting salary, reduction of bad hires or unlocking discounts.
experience: John is an AI architect with Intel Labs. He served as Chief Data Scientist for US SOCOM. He built his own coin. Two tours in Afghanistan.
